Reviews.Title: “Noisy Birds”
Reviews.Author: jennifer a
Reviews.Content: This Super 8 would be pretty average, other than the owners birds. We had a really hard time falling asleep and putting our 14 month old daughter to bed because we could hear them in our room from 10pm to midnight. Definitely had a rough night.

Reviews.Title: “Good for a quick stopover”
Reviews.Author: flutterby24a
Reviews.Content: Check in was quick and the woman at the desk was friendly. This hotel is very convenient and clean. My only issue- Upon checking out I started to walk to the desk (from the nearby breakfast area) and the man at the desk looked at me and went into the back room. I then had to wait at least 5 minutes and finally as my husband asked why I was still waiting he came back out to help me. It was odd and added to that there is no bell at the desk. So my only options to get help are to stand there and wait or yell. Location is great. It's not far off the highway and it is right by Walmart and several places to eat. Perfect stop and sleep location.

Reviews.Title: “Quality stay for cheap”
Reviews.Author: grunter4
Reviews.Content: We only stayed one night. It was clean enough, easy in easy out, and plenty of places to eat. Right off the expressway, and served its purpose for what we needed.

Reviews.Title: “I would stay her again anytime!”
Reviews.Author: radmanfalconer
Reviews.Content: My son in law, grandson and I were in town for the Brickyard 400 last weekend, and our stay could not have been better. Our double nonsmoking room was spotless!!! the staff was very friendly, and more than willing to help in any way. The motel is located right off I-465 and was very near everything you could need while traveling.If you are looking for a good place to stay, at a great price... This is just what you want. We will be back!!!

Reviews.Title: “Rip Off”
Reviews.Author: warriorfootballmom
Reviews.Content: My severely physically handicapped husband became ill on the way home from taking our son to college in Iowa. We called ahead to this motel and explained the special accomodations required to care for him, and we were told they could meet the requirements. We arrived late at night, and before they would even show me the room, I was required to sign the credit card slip, so they could "close out their books" for the night. When I got to the room it was not at all as described, and there was no way to take care of my husband there, as I could not even get him into their bed. When I went back to the desk they refused to give me a refund, and even charged me for my two lap dogs, which were never out of our car. The credit card company said there is nothing they can do, and the motel staff lied and said we were there and used the room for six hours! We were not! Instead we went directly across the street to the Red Roof Inn, where they not only had the correct accomodations, but were extremely concerned and helpful. DO NOT STAY at this Super 8. They will rip you off.

Reviews.Title: “Pleasantly Surprised”
Reviews.Author: J-Pop7
Reviews.Content: I was pleasantly surprised - the hotel is in an awesome location - close to the highway, but quiet. You can get downtown in 10-15 minutes max. It sits right in front of a Super Wal-Mart (so you can get anything you might need) and has about a dozen eateries nearby. No, it isn't the Crowne Plaza, so you do have to park your own car and carry your own bags. But the staff could not have been nicer. The room was sparkling clean, had a zillion cable channels to watch, and free internet...and every morning a free breakfast. What more could you possibly expect for fifty bucks?

Reviews.Title: “cheap, cheap, cheap”
Reviews.Author: cactus7
Reviews.Content: Spent one night (Friday)....everything here is on the cheap. Since it is a Super 8, I didn't expect much in terms of "luxury" but the bed was coming apart, the towels were thin and worn.....very small rooms. The front desk person was not the friendliest person around. It's just an old structure inside and out. Avoid this property, there are plenty of other hotels around the area. The only good thing about this place was the location to downtown Indy and plenty of restaurants nearby.

Reviews.Title: “Pleasant stay”
Reviews.Author: Mite33
Reviews.Content: Was there for two nights while on a short business trip Convenient location Pleasant staff Clean room No luxury but everything was Convenient breakfast Would go there again and recommend to a friend

HotelInfo.Name: Super 8 Indianapolis/Emerson
HotelInfo.Address: 4530 S Emerson Ave, Indianapolis, IN 46203
